channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-9282] Minor logging cleanup; shorten logs, remove redundant info
item.description: Minor log cleanup; trying to get it so hbase logs can be read on a laptop screen w/o having to scroll right.
item.summary: Minor logging cleanup; shorten logs, remove redundant info

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Committed to 0.95 branch and to trunk. Thanks for review.
My patch wouldn't compile. Here is addendum to fix (Sorry about build breakage)

FAILURE: Integrated in hbase-0.95 #481 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/hbase-0.95/481/)
